original_title: Take Me to the World: A Sondheim 90th Birthday Celebration
overview: To celebrate the 90th birthday of Broadway songwriting great Stephen Sondheim, an A-list group of performers sing songs of inspiration from his songbook in a concert event filmed in their homes. Hosted and co-produced by Ra√∫l Esparza, the acclaimed one-night-only event was created as a benefit for ASTEP (Artists Striving to End Poverty).
title: Take Me to the World: A Sondheim 90th Birthday Celebration
